title: How to Make a Powerful JADAM Natural Pesticide by mixing JWA+JS+JHS for Gardeners. Homemade

tasks.task: Mix and store JADAM natural pesticide
subtasks: Boil herbs for JADAM herbal solution
Vacuum seal the herbal solution in a bottle
Check the herbal solution's usability with JADAM wetting agent
Store the opened herbal solution properly
Use ethanol to extend the shelf life of the herbal solution
Consider using sodium hydroxide and red clay powder for specific pests
Combine JADAM wetting agent, sulfur, and herbal solution to create a natural disinfectant
Adjust the concentration of JADAM wetting agent and herbal solution for insecticidal effect
Consider using additional sodium hydroxide for scale insects and snails

tasks.task: Demonstrate how to mix JADAM natural pesticide in a sprayer
subtasks: Use soft water when mixing the pesticide
Measure the correct ratios of JADAM wetting agent, sulfur, and herbal solution
Add additional water to achieve the desired volume

tasks.task: Store the mixed JADAM natural pesticide
subtasks: Label the sprayer with the mixture details
Note the shelf life and handling precautions
